item.title: Set up centralized SSH key storage for external Active Directory users in FreeIPA (including FIDO2 hardware keys)
item.description: Intro I was tired of entering my password every time I SSH’d to my VMs, but setting up SSH keys would mean manually copying my public key to each host I wanted to connect to. I then read about one key feature of FreeIPA, which is serving as a centralized key repository. This posed another problem: I donâ€™t have any users in FreeIPA, as I mainly use my AD credentials (FreeIPA is one way only, and many services interact directly with Active Directory).
